id1.description: Supervised IT operational and development processes. Administration of Google Workspace and Microsoft Admin Center. Cloud server administration and monitoring. Participated in the administration of an in-house ERP system development lifecycle. Designed, developed, and maintained WordPress websites. Full-stack software development using C# and Azure SQL Server.

id2.description: Supported physical infrastructure management in the server room. Assisted with server performance and stability testing. Performed Ethernet cabling, patching, and connectivity verification.
